channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Chiayi Transforms Former Police Station Into Cultural Hub
item.description: A former police station in Chiayi City in southern Taiwan is now officially a cultural hub to give visitors the chance to explore the community's culture and history.

item.title: Hualien Earthquake One Month On: County Becomes Tourism Desert
item.description: One month on from the massive earthquake in Taiwan, businesses in Hualien face an uncertain future as tourism to the county plummets. Residents are hoping an almost US$1 billion ai

item.title: Majority of Workplace Injuries Are in Construction: Ministry
item.description: Taiwan's labor ministry says up to 70% of workplace injuries in the country occur in the construction sector.

item.title: Taiwanese Citizens Barred From Working for Chinaâ€™s Cultural Centers
item.description: Taiwan's government has added Confucius Institutes to the list of Chinese government bodies that Taiwanese citizens are banned from working for.
